4.title: Lead Business Analyst
4.job_description:
[
Here at Master of Code Global, we are expanding our BA community of experts and looking for a BA Practice Lead to help us shape and lead this practice. As it is a new role, you will be reporting to the Client Delivery Director. Together, your responsibility is to build a strong BA center of expertise able to support our clients across the entire SDLC, starting from the pre-sales phase. You are expected to be a servant leader, able to shape the educational and career plan for your community members as well as coach them on the leading BA practices.Requirements:
4+ years of solid experience as a Business Analyst in the IT industry
Advanced English language skills is a must
CCBA or CBAP certified at least a year ago
Demonstrated direct working experience with Clients from North America, Western Europe or both
Strong knowledge and experience in various business analysis activities across the entire software development life cycle as well as different delivery methodologies, requirements soliciting techniques, as well as scope and risk management
Strong interpersonal/customer-relations skills and the ability to guide customer/user ideas into realistic system/functional solutions
High flexibility to adapt to changing stakeholders, requirements but same time ability to structure, control and prioritize the process
Knowledge of business processes optimization and modeling approaches
Experience using requirements management tools (at least JIRA)
Awareness of the latest UI/UX trends in web and mobile development
Proficient in writing functional and nonfunctional requirements, system diagrams, and wireframes
Modeling skills to represent requirements information in graphical form
Experience in delivering functional design and solutions to the business audience
Experience working with UML diagrams (Use Cases, Class Diagram)
Experience in BPMN framework and tools
Excellent problem-solving, analytical and investigative skills
Excellent communication, presentation, and negotiation skills
Motivated by research, investigations, and learnings
A motivated and ambitious leader with a proactive approach
Demonstrated coaching and mentoring skills
Team player
Focused on driving results over processes
Desired skills:
Experience leading a team of BAs in complex project environments, multiple projects or both
Experience in UX/UI prototyping
Proven Experience in building a BA community, incl. development of a Skills Matrix, educational plan, and its successful implementation
Experience at least in two different domains (conversational solutions, e-commerce, web and mobile development are preferable)
Key Responsibilities:
Be instrumental in building and leading MOC’s BA community, including being the coach for the team
Build a scalable and predictable BA practice as-a-service to be used across various stages of SDLC
Establish, educate in and maintain standards for business and system analysis, including key processes, best practices, frameworks, metrics, techniques, templates, and tools of the BA community within MOC
Contribute to the continuous improvement of business analysis practices used as well as other procedures within the company
Create, implement, and monitor a standardized educational plan for the BA practice and ensure that it is up to date with the latest IT industry best practices. Includes establishing a knowledge management process to share best practices.
Ensure that the BA practice representatives are successful on their projects, deliver on expected quality as well as support cases management when needed
Support company-wide transformation initiatives
Benefits:
Onboarding and mentoring process for new Masters
Opportunity for growth and developmen
Medical insurance coverage
Our Team here: https://www.facebook.com/master.of.code.team/
]

7.title: Business Analyst
7.job_description:
[
Master of Code Global is specializing in AI-powered conversational experiences and apps & web development. Founded in 2004, we are a US company with development centers in Ukraine (Cherkasy and Kyiv) and Canada (Winnipeg). Our clients mainly come from North America, Western Europe, and the Middle East. Our portfolio includes 400+ successfully delivered projects for clients like T-Mobile, Aveda, LivePerson, Chatfuel, eBags, Burberry, Estee Lauder, and many more.Moreover, we have our own conversational and e-commerce products co-developed with our partners.Our vision is to make a life-changing impact on people all over the world through digital communication experiences. Along this journey, we strive to create a place and a team people will aspire to join.We never stop increasing the quality of our projects, that is why we are looking for a candidate who is:
Business analyst with 2+ years of experience in IT;
QA Engineer, aiming for professional development in the BA field.
Requirements:
Asking the right questions to understand user needs and problems
Requirements elicitation
Analysis of business needs
An ability to structure gathered information into clear requirements
An ability to communicate with different types of stakeholders
Practical experience using various BA techniques (User Stories, Use Cases, Brainstorming, Interview, and others)
Decision-making skills
Performing user acceptance testing
Awareness of the latest UI/UX tendencies of web and mobile platforms
Upper-Intermediate level (B2-C1) of English proficiency
Desired skills:
Experience creating wireframes and prototypes
Experience working with UML diagrams (Use Cases, Class Diagram)
BPMN knowledge
Experience using tools for requirements management (G Suite Services, MS Office, GitHub, Enterprise Architect or any other alternatives)
Experience working with statistics and analytics
Key Responsibilities:
Support your Team in the process of estimation
Hold sync meetings
Elicit and validate requirements
Define, analyze and document business needs and requirements
Manage Sprint planning and monitoring
Consult your Team during the development and testing processes
Benefits:
Onboarding and mentoring process for new Masters
Opportunity for growth and development: we encourage your IIBA certification
Medical insurance coverage
Our Team here: https://www.facebook.com/master.of.code.team/
]

11.title: SAP-аналитик (пгт Гостомель)
11.job_description:
[
Наш клиент — крупная международная швейцарская компания, ищет в свою командуSAP аналитика. Обязанности:
Анализ данных SAP SuccessFactors
Обучение и поддержка пользователей программы
Сбор и оценка запросов на совершенствование системы
Подготовка отчетов
Обработка и проверка целостности данных, используемых для анализа
Требования:
от 1 года опыта работы аналитиком
Свободное владение английским языком
Отличные коммуникативные навыки
Готовность к командировкам за границу 
Желательно опыт работы с HR-системами, такими как Peoplesoft
Опыт использования языков программирования, таких как SQL будет преимуществом
Компания предлагает:
Официальное трудоустройство согласно КЗпП
Белая заработная плата 
Медицинская страховка
Корпоративная мобильная связь
Оплата обедов
Компенсация проезда
График работы: Пн — Пт с 8.00 до 17.00
Если ты готов обучаться, развиваться и ищешь интересную динамичную работу, смело отправляй своё резюме!
]
